About this App Created by Christopher Tunney (S1315065) Version 1.0 Under Development! This feature is currently unusable, but will be fixed in a later release.
MusicRoom.com Features of this App Using the My Sheets Feature Adding Sheet Music Entries to your Library Editing a Sheet Entry from your Library Using the Music News Page This app will allow you to store information on any of your sheet music. You can even edit your entries after you add them! You can also view the latest news from the MusicNotes.com blog. From the main menu, tap on the My Sheets button. This will display your library of sheet music you have collected and added here. From the My Sheets page, tap on the circle button at the bottom right of the screen. This will take you to the form to add a new sheet entry. Tapping any of the blank spaces will bring up the keyboard. Hit the circular save button when you are finished. The title is required but the rest are optional! Tap on an entry from the library. This will take you the edit page. Tapping on the contents you entered previously will bring up the keyboard. Tap on the circular save button when you are finished. From the main menu, tap on the Music News button. After loading, a list will appear, with each item displaying information on each post of the MusicNotes.com blog. Tapping on any of these posts will open that post on the web. You can also access the blog website by tapping on the MUSICNOTES BLOG button at the very top of the screen, which will open the blog in your default browser.>
